ISSUE.TITLE: Tables are not re-created after uninstalling and installing a plugin
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Uninstall any plugin with tables (e.g. Facebook or Avalara) 2. Install it one more time 3. No tables created

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4133 Fix wrong values in disabled checkboxes for multistore settings

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4832 Fixed upgrade script; delete the migrations of not installed plugins to avoid problems with their installation on the future
